forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy. Showers developing this afternoon. High around 20C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy. Showers developing this afternoon. High 68F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with a steady rain, possibly heavy at times in the evening. Winds diminishing late. Low 16C. S winds at 40 to 55 km/h, decreasing to 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with a steady rain, possibly heavy at times in the evening. Winds diminishing late. Low around 60F. S winds at 25 to 35 mph, decreasing to 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 18C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 64F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds S at 55 to 80 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 95 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy. A steady rain early with showers and perhaps a rumble of thunder developing in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds S at 35 to 50 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 60 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. Low 13C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind. Low near 55F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 58F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 53F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 17C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 62F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 17C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 63F. ENE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 12C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 53F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 17C. ENE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High 63F. ENE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High near 15C. ENE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 60F. ENE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.
